_header: It reveth a man his strength and putteth him in great feebleness
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — one triplet

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
it rewith a man hys strenkt & puttit hym in grete febulnesseit
                    makyt a man foul & reuith hym hys fayrenesseit enflaumith a man &
                    castyth in gret drynesse
